A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILERS!!! Terrible movie. So dumb. Hey we are Disney and we wasted your money! Luke commits suicide for gosh sakes! He just wills himself to death! I think originally they were going to kill  Leia\, but when Carrie Fisher died\, they were like \"Everyone will see that coming\, so lets not kill her off yet\". So in 2 years there will be minimal Leia\, with what I am sure will be a terrible story to why she dies. Disney's magic hands have magically turned Star Wars - arguably one of the best dramatic franchises in history\, back to complete dog feces. I feel like I stepped in dog feces and walked around on my carpet.
